thread.section_title: The Darlington Hyde Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean, friendly and central
thread.title_full: Clean, friendly and central - Review of The Darlington Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: TorgeirBr
title: Clean, friendly and central
text: The hotel has an excellent location a short walk from the Heathrow Express and Paddington tube station. Walking to a lot of main attractions is also possible. The staff is very friendly, and the free breakfast is nice. The room was clean and modern. Size of the room is as expected for a hotel in this price range in London. Our main concern is the bed which we found too small for a couple. Not having individual bed sheets may also be challenge for some
